long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Marvel Wallpaper - New Tab Theme specially made for fans of Marvel.

Install Marvel Wallpaper - New Tab Theme and enjoy varied HD wallpapers of Marvel Comics, every time you open a new tab.

If you are fan of Marvel Heroes and Marvel Comics, that this product is right for you.

What we offer you are HD Marvel Comics themes, including avengers comics wallpaper, like Spiderman, Thor, Ironman, Hulk, etc.

First, you can enjoy a wide range of wallpapers in HD quality. Every time you enter new tab, we shuffle your favorite Marvel wallpaper only. Marvel movies hit a great success among all of us, which is why we wanted to create amazing extension to showcase all amazing Marvel wallpapers. Same as you, we are looking into all upcoming Marvel movies. 

Second, the extension provides quick navigation to your most visited sites, Facebook, Instagram. Amazon, YouTube, and quick reminder with To-Do List right on the theme. Date, time can also be shown on Marvel Wallpaper new tab if you need.

Finally, you can enjoy all these features, and if you have any request we are here to listen you and implement all new features that you want to have.
